title: The Strongest Black Knight (♂️), Changing Job Into a Battle Maid (♀️) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Betrayal   Bodyguards   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Maids   Male to Female   Military   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Reincarnation   Royalty   Soldiers   Sword Wielder   Tomboyish Female Lead   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love
author: Momokado Isshin   百門一新
description: Albright, who was famous as “the strongest Black Knight”, was reincarnated as a girl, Maria, whose ribbon suited her well for some reason. Maria, 16 years old, is currently a maid in the Marquess of Urband family in attendance to the Daughter of the Marquees, Relena. After Relena became engaged to the 4th Prince, the area around Maria had gotten busier…>
